import React from 'react'; import './About.css'; export default function About() { return (

About Us

Empowering the World to Edit Smarter, Create Faster

At Gen AI Editor, we're revolutionizing how video and photo editing is done. Our platform blends intuitive design with the power of artificial intelligence, helping creators produce stunning results with ease.

Whether you're removing a video background or cleaning up a photograph, Gen AI is here to make advanced editing accessible to all.

üåü Our Mission

We aim to simplify creativity through automation. Editing should be powerful, but never complicated. With Gen AI, we‚Äôre removing the barriers to professional-level visuals ‚Äî so anyone can create.

üõ†Ô∏è Tech Behind the Magic

  • ‚öõÔ∏è React.js frontend for smooth interaction
  • üöÄ FastAPI backend for blazing speed
  • üß† AI models (RVM, Mask2Former, rembg)
  • üéûÔ∏è OpenCV + MoviePy for video frame logic
  • üíª CPU-deployed via Render

üí° What You Can Do

  • üé¨ Remove backgrounds from full videos
  • üñºÔ∏è Remove unwanted objects from frames
  • ‚ú® Apply smart enhancements in one click
  • üìÇ Upload and export with ease
  • üîú More tools coming soon

üë• Who We Are

A small team of developers, designers, and AI nerds passionate about changing how creative tools work. We build for speed, simplicity, and real-world impact.

We don't just build tools ‚Äî we build bridges between your idea and the result. üöÄ

); }
